Metadata: Currents (Volume 4, Number 1 and Number 2, June and November 1977)
Oregon State University Sea Grant Program
Two newsletter issues in one entry for 1977.

The following cover articles are in these two newsletter issues: Seafood builds bodies, not brains; Borers bore during drought. Other topics: Interview: Jan Wyatt, Sea Grant Advisory Council; Scientists fight fish diseases together; Breese scouts Chile. These issues each include an insert with a listing of Oregon Sea Grant funded publications available.
